channel.title: Realm PK [317]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/7448/realmpklogo.png[/img][/center]
[b]What makes this server special?[/b] [i]Well,we have very loyal players,perfectly pking system and unique economy which you can't find in other servers.Also we have a lot of bosses and other special features such as ring of viguar,divine effects.Also we have voting,pkp,pvm systems.And much more.[/i]
[b]How long server will live?[/b] [i]More than 10 years for sure.We have a lot of active players,donators.Also our owner has many funds to make server live long.[/i]
[b]How about skills and pking?[/b] [i]In server you will find 2 skills,pking and thieving.Pking skill goes to 99 and thieving to 525.Server is based on pking and pvming.[/i]
[b]Features[/b] [i]- Highscores - WebClient - 317 PI GameFrame - Fully working curses - Combat Icons Next to Damage - 100% working normal,ancient,lunar magics. - PERFECT Bridding / Switching - Working Spirit Shield Effects - No dupes - Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP. - Great Economy - Weekly updates - Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects - Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's)[/i] - And a lot more
[b]Quick look at server[/b] [img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/5442/borkx.png[/img] [img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/2913/chaosxl.png[/img] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/6731/photo1x.png[/img] [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/1463/ph2x.png[/img] [img]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/8763/ph3x.png[/img] [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/9137/ph4x.png[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/7950/thevx.png[/img] [img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/9130/duelx.png[/img] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/3779/pkeriaix.png[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/7728/03f7ec6c027fbfb21399e7d.png[/img]
[img]http://www.adriancourreges.com/images/download-small.png[/img][b]Server Client:[/b] [url=http://www.realm-pk.com/client.php]www.realm-pk.com/client.php[/url] [img]https://moodle.org/theme/image.php/moodleorgcleaned_moodleorg/forum/1398247490/icon[/img][b]Server Website:[/b] [url=http://www.realm-pk.com]www.realm-pk.com[/url]

item.title: Realm PK [317]
item.dc:creator: @amarad amarad
item.description:
@amarad wrote:

[center][/center]

What makes this server special?
Well,we have very loyal players,perfectly pking system and unique economy which you can’t find in other servers.Also we have a lot of bosses and other special features such as ring of viguar,divine effects.Also we have voting,pkp,pvm systems.And much more.

How long server will live?
More than 10 years for sure.We have a lot of active players,donators.Also our owner has many funds to make server live long.

How about skills and pking?
In server you will find 2 skills,pking and thieving.Pking skill goes to 99 and thieving to 525.Server is based on pking and pvming.

Features
[i]- Highscores

  • WebClient
  • 317 PI GameFrame
  • Fully working curses
  • Combat Icons Next to Damage
  • 100% working normal,ancient,lunar magics.
  • PERFECT Bridding / Switching
  • Working Spirit Shield Effects
  • No dupes
  • Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP.
  • Great Economy
  • Weekly updates
  • Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects
  • Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect’s)[/i]
  • And a lot more

Quick look at server









Server Client: www.realm-pk.com/client.php
Server Website: www.realm-pk.com
